description: Barracuda® LP hard drives from Seagate® allow you to do more with less - delivering the absolute best combination of power savings and performance in the industry. While other drives have labels that include words like "green" or "eco", Barracuda LP actually delivers on the low power promise. With power consumption levels up to 40% lower than standard desktop alternatives and best in class green performance, Barracuda LP really is the low power drive that won't slow you down.
title: Seagate Barracuda LP 1 TB 5900RPM SATA 3 GB/s 32 MB Cache 3.5-Inch Internal Hard Drive ST31000520AS-Bare Drive
